name: Overgrown (itch) (RRasche)
description:
In this game we will see who is the moss(t) hardest survivor. Fight against your opponent to take rule over the forest in this two player local versus game.
In game letters will appear on the ground and by pressing the coresponding keys on your keyboard, you'll conquer the tile to your side. Both you and your opponent share the same keyboard and there is no predefined controlset. Every keypress can be benefitial or detremental to you!

Let the Grow begin!
